thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Beautiful Hotel, Perfect Location
thread.title_full: Beautiful Hotel, Perfect Location - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: MsSKB
title: Beautiful Hotel, Perfect Location
text: Booked based on Trip Advisor reviews and leaped with faith and we couldn't be more delighted! From responding to myriad Emailed questions before arrival, to the room, breakfast, attentive staff and rooftop restaurant, "Absolutely Terrific" is our review! When we come back to Rome (and we haven't left yet) we will certainly choose Hotel Artemide. Our advice? Booking somewhere else would be a mistake!
